title: inverter_red_warning_and_shutdown_time
summary: Inverter shows red warning indicator; farm power becomes unavailable; inverter is shut down for the night.
description: The hybrid solar inverter shows a red warning light indicating an energy/power status alert. Farm electricity is no longer available at this time. This record marks the inverter shutdown time for the night. Reference is made to the inverter start/open time recorded earlier (data unit 00033). Work continues under electrical system constraints.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
